Key Match Events: Washington Sundar scored 50 off 28 balls for India
Pre-Game Insights: Shubman Gill and Ishan Kishan are set to open for India
Ben Lister could be in line for a debut for New Zealand
Ish Sodhi is fit and has great numbers in India
India have won all three T20Is played in Ranchi so far
Mitchell Santner has had a good year in T20Is with both bat and ball
Post-Match Reflections: India lost the match and the series is now in jeopardy
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ranchi is a bowl-first venue, with chasing teams winning 16 of the 25 T20 games hosted here
Dew is expected to play a big role in the second innings
Others: Finn Allen scored ducks in the last two ODIs on this tour
Kuldeep Yadav and Yuzvendra Chahal could be fighting for the same spot in India's spin attack
